tests.name: 01_base_agent_native_tools
tests.description: Base agent test: validate native tool usage (write/read/find) inside the sessionDir workspace.
tests.default_question: Create a file named native_tools_check.txt with the content 'native tools ok'. Then read the file back and confirm the content. Finally, list the files in the current workspace.

tests.name: 02_customer_data_active_incidents
tests.description: Base agent calling the customer_data_agent to retrieve active incidents for a specific customer.
tests.default_question: Use the customer_data agent to fetch active platform incidents (use get_active_incidents). Summarize the incidents clearly.

tests.name: 03_knowledge_agent_compare_stone_vs_infinitepay
tests.description: Base agent calling the knowledge_base_agent to compare Stone vs InfinitePay using both web_search and rag_search (vector DB).
tests.default_question: Compare Stone vs InfinitePay. Use web_search to fetch current public information, and also use rag_search in the 'infinitepay' namespace to ground the InfinitePay side from the vector database. Write the comparison to a file named compare.md and then present the key findings.
